title: Crew Neck
text: Product: Crew Neck | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 70, 18, 9, 3 | Colors: blue, green, navy | Materials: cashmere, cotton, silk | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
This exceptional crew neck embodies understated luxury and versatility, expertly crafted in Northern Italy from a sumptuous blend of 70% cashmere and 30% silk. Thoughtfully designed with ribbing at the neckline, cuffs, and hem, it features a natural drape that adds structure while allowing for freedom of movement.

We are proud to source only the finest fibres to produce a superior silk-cashmere blend in the heart of Italy. This prestigious fabric is finer than our [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere" title="pure cashmere knitwear"]pure cashmere knitwear[/url][/u][/b], offering a lightweight, breathable and ultra-soft handle with a refined 18-gauge knit.

An elegant year-round staple, this knit transitions effortlessly across seasons—from a standalone layer on cool spring-summer evenings to a refined underlayer beneath a [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b] in autumn-winter. Pair it with our [b][u][url="/shop/chinos" title="cotton chinos"]cotton chinos[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="classic denim"]classic denim[/url][/u][/b] for both business-casual office attire and relaxed weekend wear.
structured_data.name: Crew Neck

title: Portofino Shirt
text: Product: Portofino Shirt | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: S, XS, M, L, XL, 30, 15, 5, 75, 16 | Colors: blue, white, brown, pink | Materials: cotton, linen | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Indulge in the epitome of timeless summer luxury with the Portofino, our signature linen shirt. Featuring our iconic “Paramontura” one-piece collar to create a clean design and lasting shape for an elegant appeal. Meticulously crafted in Bergamo and Brescia, in Northern Italy, by skilled artisans using the finest Italian linen and Australian mother of pearl buttons, finished with rare sartorial details such as the “giglio” stitching. 

Available in slim and regular fit options, to provide a tailored and refined silhouette. 

With a versatile yet sophisticated approach to smart-casual dressing, this classic linen shirt is perfect for leisurely holidays and city escapades making it the quintessential summer wardrobe staple. Match with our [b][u][url="/shop/linen-trousers" title="linen trousers"]linen trousers[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/bermuda-linen-shorts" title="Bermuda linen shorts"]Bermuda linen shorts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/lightweight-cotton-chinos" title="lightweight chinos"]lightweight chinos[/url][/u][/b] to effortlessly bridge your day-to-evening looks.
structured_data.name: Portofino Shirt

title: Brera Polo Shirt
text: Product: Brera Polo Shirt | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 7, 9, 11, 13 | Colors: blue, white, brown, red | Materials: cotton, suede | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Our classic Brera polo shirt is crafted in Brescia with resistant, soft and breathable Italian cotton piqué and finished with mother of pearl buttons.

Designed with sartorial details from our classic shirts such as our signature “Paramontura” one-piece collar ensuring an elegant and lasting shape. The sleeves are additionally characterised by the typical cuffs of our shirts, adding a touch of sophistication to this casual piece.

Perfect for every season, this versatile polo shirt can be worn as a single staple piece or layered under a [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b], quintessential for both casual or formal occasions. Create a pristine look by pairing it with our [b][u][url="/shop/lightweight-cotton-chinos" title="lightweight cotton chinos"]lightweight cotton chinos[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="denim jeans"]denim jeans[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/wool-trousers" title="wool pleated trousers"]wool pleated trousers[/url][/u][/b].
structured_data.name: Brera Polo Shirt

title: Knitted Polo
text: Product: Knitted Polo | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 70, 18, 13, 2 | Colors: blue, green, grey | Materials: cashmere, cotton, silk | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Crafted in Bergamo, Northern Italy, from an exquisite blend of 70% cashmere and 30% silk, offering an elegant and modern take on our classic [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere-polo-sweaters" title="polo sweater"]polo sweater[/url][/u][/b]. With its sophisticated design, it features a spread collar adorned with three horn buttons, complemented by ribbed trims at the cuffs and hem for a modern silhouette with a natural drape that effortlessly adapts to your body.

We are proud to source only the finest fibres to produce a superior silk-cashmere blend in the heart of Italy. This prestigious fabric is finer than our [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere" title="pure cashmere knitwear"]pure cashmere knitwear[/url][/u][/b], offering a lightweight, breathable and ultra-soft handle with a refined 18-gauge knit.

Welcome sophistication for both on and off-duty moments by layering it over our [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shirts" title="cotton shirts"]cotton shirts[/url][/u][/b] during the colder months or worn solo for a relaxed yet suave mid-season look. Pair it with [b][u][url="/shop/chinos" title="chinos"]chinos[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="denim"]denim[/url][/u][/b] for smart-casual office attire, or style it with our [b][u][url="/shop/wool-trousers" title="wool trousers"]wool trousers[/url][/u][/b] for an understated evening ensemble.
structured_data.name: Knitted Polo

title: Lightweight Chinos
text: Product: Lightweight Chinos | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: S, 30, 28, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 97, 3 | Colors: beige, brown, white, grey | Materials: cotton, silk | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Elevate your spring-summer wardrobe with our cotton chinos, crafted in Northern Italy from lightweight and durable whipcord cotton. This breathable fabric is blended with 3% elastane for added stretch ensuring a more comfortable and easier fit.

Our chinos feature a mid-rise and slightly tapered fit, designed to provide a refined and sophisticated look. With a focus on practicality, this piece is tailored with four convenient pockets and bespoke details such as a concealed triple button closure, an internal waistband to keep your shirt neatly tucked in and a central fastener to secure your belt in place.

Build the foundation of your spring-summer wardrobe with this versatile design that can be dressed up with one of our [b][u][url="/shop/best-sellers" title="signature shirts"]signature shirts[/url][/u][/b] or dressed down with our [b][u][url="/shop/polos" title="polo shirts"]polo shirts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/t-shirts" title="t-shirts"]t-shirts[/url][/u][/b] to create a classic or casual look.
structured_data.name: Lightweight Chinos

title: Siena Shirt
text: Product: Siena Shirt | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 15, 5, 75, 16 | Colors: blue, green, black, white | Materials: cashmere, cotton, suede | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Our Siena shirt is meticulously crafted in Brescia, Northern Italy, with premium cotton piqué. This textile is characterised by a distinctive diamond texture, which is not only resistant and breathable but effortlessly comfortable, due to the natural stretch typically found in a polo. The shirt’s cutaway collar and mother of pearl buttons add an extra touch of sophistication and refinement. 

The Siena shirt’s pastel-coloured hues are traditionally achieved through an exclusive garment dye process known as "tinto capo" by our skilled artisans, resulting in a subtle light-washed effect that exudes timeless charm.

The Siena is an extremely versatile all-year-round design, ideal for both casual and formal occasions, perfect as a single staple piece or elegantly layered under a [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b]. Pair with our [b][u][url="/shop/lightweight-cotton-chinos" title="lightweight cotton chinos"]lightweight cotton chinos[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="jeans"]jeans[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shorts" title="cotton shorts"]cotton shorts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/cortina-cotton-chinos" title="winter chinos"]winter chinos[/url][/u][/b].
structured_data.name: Siena Shirt

title: Hoodie
text: Product: Hoodie | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 70, 18, 4, 2 | Colors: blue, white, black, navy | Materials: cashmere, silk | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Effortlessly uniting luxury with modern ease, our hoodie is expertly crafted in Bergamo, Northern Italy, from a sumptuous blend of 70% cashmere and 30% silk. Designed with a streamlined silhouette, it features a natural drape that gently conforms to your shape, while ribbed trims at the cuffs and hem provide a tailored finish. Its pullover design strikes the perfect balance between elegance with versatility, transitioning seamlessly from casual outings to refined lounging.

We are proud to source only the finest fibres to produce a superior silk-cashmere blend in the heart of Italy. This prestigious fabric is finer than our [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere" title="pure cashmere knitwear"]pure cashmere knitwear[/url][/u][/b], offering a lightweight, breathable and ultra-soft handle with a refined 18-gauge knit.

Whether layered over a [b][u][url="/shop/t-shirts" title="T-shirt"]T-shirt[/url][/u][/b] for weekend escapes or paired with a [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shirts" title="classic shirt"]classic shirt[/url][/u][/b] for elevated casual ensembles, this hoodie adapts effortlessly to your lifestyle. For a contemporary approach to smart-casual dressing, style it under our [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/leather-jackets" title="leather jacket"]leather jacket[/url][/u][/b]. Complete the look with [b][u][url="/shop/wool-trousers" title="wool trousers"]wool trousers[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/chinos" title="chinos"]chinos[/url][/u][/b] or our [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere-joggers" title="cashmere joggers"]cashmere joggers[/url][/u][/b] for relaxed loungewear.
structured_data.name: Hoodie

title: Knitted Polo
text: Product: Knitted Polo | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 18, 7, 11, 9 | Colors: blue, brown, green, navy | Materials: cotton, linen, wool | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Details
Our knitted short-sleeved polo is crafted in Bergamo, in Northern Itay, from the finest organic cotton. This luxurious piece features a refined rib-knit collar adorned with three mother of pearl buttons to match the colour of the polo for a sophisticated tone-on-tone appeal. This prestigious yarn guarantees zero pilling, maintaining its pristine look and soft texture. Knitted with gauge 18 to provide an ultra-light handle, this fitted but comfortable design naturally drapes around your body shape. Finished with a straight hemline to bring this polo together giving it a sleek silhouette.

Use
This exceptionally refreshing polo adds a relaxed touch of sophistication to your summer attire, making it the perfect choice for those particularly balmy days. Bridge your day-to-evening smart-casual looks seamlessly by pairing with lightweight wool trousers or chinos.
structured_data.name: Knitted Polo

title: Jeans
text: Product: Jeans | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: S, 30, 28, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 4, 9 | Colors: blue, white, grey | Materials: leather, cotton, denim | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Meticulously crafted by experienced artisans in Lago d’Iseo from a premium mid-weight pure denim cotton, featuring natural stretch for easy comfort, our elegant jeans are designed to provide durability and long-lasting character. This resilient denim cloth is produced in the province of Padua in a mill that’s been creating high-quality textiles since 1887.

Our jeans are exceptionally comfortable, featuring a mid-rise and slightly tapered profile that effortlessly complements both casual and refined outfits. Free from metal rivets and leather patches, they offer a sleek, streamlined look without the discomfort of traditional details. Available in light-aged and dark-aged washes, these jeans boast a subtle worn-in finish for versatile year-round wear.

Pair them with our [b][u][url="/shop/polos" title="classic polos"]classic polos[/url][/u][/b] and [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shirts" title="cotton shirts"]cotton shirts[/url][/u][/b] to complete a smart-casual look from spring to summer. For an elevated touch during the colder months of the year, style them with our pure [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere" title="cashmere knitwear"]cashmere knitwear[/url][/u][/b].
structured_data.name: Jeans

title: Zip-up
text: Product: Zip-up | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 70, 18, 8, 2 | Colors: brown, green, navy, grey | Materials: cashmere, silk, suede | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
An elevated essential, our finest quarter zip is expertly crafted in Bergamo, Northern Italy from a luxurious blend of 70% cashmere and 30% silk. With a classic design, it’s adorned with a premium Lanfranchi zipper and features ribbing on the funnel collar, cuffs and hem for a fitted yet modern silhouette. 

We are proud to source only the finest fibres to produce a superior silk-cashmere blend in the heart of Italy. This prestigious fabric is finer than our [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere" title="pure cashmere knitwear"]pure cashmere knitwear[/url][/u][/b], offering a lightweight, breathable and ultra-soft handle with a refined 18-gauge knit.

Whether layered over our [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shirts" title="classic shirts"]classic shirts[/url][/u][/b] for a sleek office ensemble or styled with [b][u][url="/shop/chinos" title="chinos"]chinos[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="jeans"]jeans[/url][/u][/b] for an effortlessly refined weekend look, this piece unites sophistication and unparalleled comfort. Perfect for year-round wear, it offers versatility as a standalone staple over a [b][u][url="/shop/t-shirts" title="T-shirt"]T-shirt[/url][/u][/b] on cooler evenings or layers under a [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b] through the colder season.
structured_data.name: Zip-up

structured_data.description:
Indulge in the epitome of timeless summer luxury with the Portofino, our signature linen shirt. Featuring our iconic “Paramontura” one-piece collar to create a clean design and lasting shape for an elegant appeal. Meticulously crafted in Bergamo and Brescia, in Northern Italy, by skilled artisans using the finest Italian linen and Australian mother of pearl buttons, finished with rare sartorial details such as the “giglio” stitching. 

Available in slim and regular fit options, to provide a tailored and refined silhouette. 

With a versatile yet sophisticated approach to smart-casual dressing, this classic linen shirt is perfect for leisurely holidays and city escapades making it the quintessential summer wardrobe staple. Match with our [b][u][url="/shop/linen-trousers" title="linen trousers"]linen trousers[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/bermuda-linen-shorts" title="Bermuda linen shorts"]Bermuda linen shorts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/lightweight-cotton-chinos" title="lightweight chinos"]lightweight chinos[/url][/u][/b] to effortlessly bridge your day-to-evening looks.

title: Lightweight Chinos
text: Product: Lightweight Chinos | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: S, 30, 28, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 97, 3 | Colors: beige, olive, white, grey, brown | Materials: cotton, linen | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Elevate your spring-summer wardrobe with our cotton chinos, crafted in Northern Italy from lightweight and durable whipcord cotton. This breathable fabric is blended with 3% elastane for added stretch ensuring a more comfortable and easier fit.

Our chinos feature a mid-rise and slightly tapered fit, designed to provide a refined and sophisticated look. With a focus on practicality, this piece is tailored with four convenient pockets and bespoke details such as a concealed triple button closure, an internal waistband to keep your shirt neatly tucked in and a central fastener to secure your belt in place.

Build the foundation of your spring-summer wardrobe with this versatile design that can be dressed up with one of our [b][u][url="/shop/best-sellers" title="signature shirts"]signature shirts[/url][/u][/b] or dressed down with our [b][u][url="/shop/polos" title="polo shirts"]polo shirts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/t-shirts" title="t-shirts"]t-shirts[/url][/u][/b] to create a classic or casual look.
structured_data.name: Lightweight Chinos

title: Siena Shirt
text: Product: Siena Shirt | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 15, 5, 75, 16 | Colors: blue, white, green, brown | Materials: cotton, linen | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Our Siena shirt is meticulously crafted in Brescia, Northern Italy, with premium cotton piqué. This textile is characterised by a distinctive diamond texture, which is not only resistant and breathable but effortlessly comfortable, due to the natural stretch typically found in a polo. The shirt’s cutaway collar and mother of pearl buttons add an extra touch of sophistication and refinement. 

The Siena shirt’s pastel-coloured hues are traditionally achieved through an exclusive garment dye process known as "tinto capo" by our skilled artisans, resulting in a subtle light-washed effect that exudes timeless charm.

The Siena is an extremely versatile all-year-round design, ideal for both casual and formal occasions, perfect as a single staple piece or elegantly layered under a [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b]. Pair with our [b][u][url="/shop/lightweight-cotton-chinos" title="lightweight cotton chinos"]lightweight cotton chinos[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="jeans"]jeans[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shorts" title="cotton shorts"]cotton shorts[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/cortina-cotton-chinos" title="winter chinos"]winter chinos[/url][/u][/b].
structured_data.name: Siena Shirt

title: Brera Polo Shirt
text: Product: Brera Polo Shirt | Prices: $300 | Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 30, 3, 2, 9, 11 | Colors: blue, white, grey, red | Materials: leather, cashmere, cotton | Availability: Unknown

structured_data.description:
Our classic Brera polo shirt is crafted in Brescia with resistant, soft and breathable Italian cotton piqué and finished with mother of pearl buttons.

Designed with sartorial details from our classic shirts such as our signature “Paramontura” one-piece collar ensuring an elegant and lasting shape. The sleeves are additionally characterised by the typical cuffs of our shirts, adding a touch of sophistication to this casual piece.

Perfect for every season, this versatile polo shirt can be worn as a single staple piece or layered under a [b][u][url="/shop/blazers" title="blazer"]blazer[/url][/u][/b], quintessential for both casual or formal occasions. Create a pristine look by pairing it with our [b][u][url="/shop/lightweight-cotton-chinos" title="lightweight cotton chinos"]lightweight cotton chinos[/url][/u][/b], [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="denim jeans"]denim jeans[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/wool-trousers" title="wool pleated trousers"]wool pleated trousers[/url][/u][/b].

structured_data.description:
An elevated essential, our finest quarter zip is expertly crafted in Bergamo, Northern Italy from a luxurious blend of 70% cashmere and 30% silk. With a classic design, it’s adorned with a premium Lanfranchi zipper and features ribbing on the funnel collar, cuffs and hem for a fitted yet modern silhouette. 

We are proud to source only the finest fibres to produce a superior silk-cashmere blend in the heart of Italy. This prestigious fabric is finer than our [b][u][url="/shop/cashmere" title="pure cashmere knitwear"]pure cashmere knitwear[/url][/u][/b], offering a lightweight, breathable and ultra-soft handle with a refined 18-gauge knit.

Whether layered over our [b][u][url="/shop/cotton-shirts" title="classic shirts"]classic shirts[/url][/u][/b] for a sleek office ensemble or styled with [b][u][url="/shop/chinos" title="chinos"]chinos[/url][/u][/b] or [b][u][url="/shop/jeans" title="jeans"]jeans[/url][/u][/b] for an effortlessly refined weekend look, this piece unites sophistication and unparalleled comfort.
